reviews.review: Игра отличная. Игроки тут не шакалы позорные. Рекомендую. <3

Game is great, especially with friends. Learning what other killers can do and leveling up is fun. Trying to survive as survivor or completly massacre the survivors as killer is just beautifully chaotic. I really like the game, even if i find a few killers annoying and there are a few facecampers here and there. dont be a dick and stop facecamping please.
video horror society > dead by midlight

10/10 game. Absolutely terrifying playing for the first time. Each killer is unique in there own way and the survivors are too. After playing casually for the first 5-10 hours, I realized how indepth this game really is. Everything is completely customizeable and there's no one way to play.
I love that you have to work as a team to escape. The game is fairly even on difficulty between the survivor and the killer.

It's pretty good. It's alright to blame meta perks for your own mental health. Just don't harrass those who use them. If survivors can run Dead hard, Borrowed, unbreakable, and Decisive strike, I should be able to run mad grit and make your choice  without getting a comment made towards me.

This game is very fun when playing with my boyfriend. He gets scared easily and likes all the characters in this game, so, we typically have a blast together. I recommend playing this game with a partner, like I, or with some friends. The out of game, voicecall co-op, makes this game come to life way more than it otherwise would without that, so, I recommend this game and to play it with others who you enjoy spending time with.

I fucking would!

A game I didn't expected to get...hooked.. on :p - 
I see a lot of reviews where its "player sided" or "killer sided" -eye roll- That should show it inst one sided if both sides believe the other side has the advantage XD
Whether you are a survivor or killer type of player, this game just keeps you coming back for more if you are into game styles that are very cat and mouse in play style. Its one of the few games I enjoy also solo queuing up and playing with randoms. IM only 300+ hours in, and will be playing for many more!
希望在游戏里能够多一些玩家互动，好玩，但是对于新手不太友好，希望能够得到高手教导

10/10 game. There could not be a more horrific/engaging game which involves putting your favorite killers against a pair of brave survivors. Would recommend this to anyone who likes horror games mixed with with a little pazazz. the game design is incredible, the killers look stunning, and the fact that you can also make fun and custom games to play with your friends is even better.
It has it's bugs and rough times, but all in all this game is fun as hell and I would recommend to anyone that is into horror survival games.
很好玩，但是更新的平衡太烂了

love nurse，make me so happy：)
nurse is so easy for green hand，believe me

Whether you want to kill others, or evade a killer, this game has what you are looking for. From jump scares by stealth killers, to hanging out with friends repairing generators, you are going to have a good time. If you are on the fence about whether you should get this or not, I (some random internet stranger) highly recommend giving it a shot!
my biggest regret in life is having 10 hours in this godforsaken dogshit fucking game

Game is very killer lopsided. If you're solo playing, expect to not get any wins. Remember that Altruism 95% of the time will get you killed. Killers run faster than survivors so don't expect to out run one. Killer buffs are more powerful than survivor buffs. Recent patch debuffed a lot of the survivor perks so unless you are 100% on point with your game play, expect to get wiped out. There are a lot of bad killers out there that will tunnel or camp the hell out of you. The ones I really don't like are the ones that stand at the hook and just hit you while you're dying for no reason. That said, with friends, the game is fun. 
While playing solo - you're going to get frustrated with the tunneling and the face camping. This is why no one wants to play survivor and killer queues are long. Changes need to be made to re-balance the game play. Throw some penalties in for face camping like a debuff to the killer that flashlight blinds them for 10 seconds or something if they face camp for more than 2 seconds.

This game is amazing. After 79 hours I finally got my Iridescent I as survivor and rarely do I get this hooked on a video game. I just can't stop playing. Bullying and harassing killers on a daily basis is just too much fun.
匹配机制能不能好点，我一个萌新玩屠夫把把配到会玩的，一天下来全是四跑我心态都炸了

After 3k hrs of playing this game I decided to break up with dead by daylight. If you don´t play in an 4 men swf it is no longer playable. I am really done to be matched with ultra high ping killers from far away for more than 80 percent of my matches. I wish all the others enough nerves for this annoying and imbalanced, buggy game.

Leider sehr viele Hacker mit Wallhacks oder Aimbot es ist traurig weil es das ganze Game kaputt macht ...... sonst aber wirklich für 4er Teams zu empfehlen :) eine einspiel Phase ist vollkommen normal das gehört dazu wie bei jedem anderen Game auch.

Leute es gibt seiten wo ihr euch fisten lassen könnt !

Really fun game buuuut...

This game needs to allow people on PC who have crossplay on AND off be able to be put into the same lobby.
The game is FILLED with game throwers.. mainly people who play on console for some reason. 
I'd say turn off crossplay but the queue times are insanely long. 
You can be in Iridescent rank and still have people that don't help with generators, leave after getting downed, or insta-kill themselves on the hook.
Great game to just chill and mess with the killer, but if you're looking to play more serious more than likely your teammates will screw you over.
If you see this review, lets start turning off crossplay and get the good survivors together!
The new update ruined the whole game killers are just too overpowered now days and so many survivor perks become useless and lost their whole point to use.

TLDR: Game can be fun and has a knack for being addictive in bursts, community lets it down by quite a high margin.

With over 700 hours balanced fairly evenly in both Killer and Survivor, I'd say I've experienced pretty much everything the game has to offer reaching max rank over and over on each side.
If you have friends and want to have fun this can definitely be a game for you, I see a lot of complaints about this game being unbalanced or not fair, just like every game yes it has those moments of maybe a swing shouldn't have hit you, maybe the killers lag makes it impossible to correctly predict movements and counter efficiently. But with over 700 hours I can say those moments were few and far between for the most part (some updates broke the game at points but were patched and fixed pretty quickly) yet I feel a lot of people who play this game regularly, are those with not a lot of mental fortitude. People seem to hold onto that one bad game and use it as a precedent for the entire game. Some people are just bad at the game which is fine, but cant admit that to themselves and instead decide to talk abusively to anybody who dares give them constructive feedback.

Ive also never quite understood the whole killer vs survivor balancing discussion, now im pretty good at both sides and like every pvp game in existence at some point youre gonna get stomped. But never did I feel like I died as survivor or lost as killer because of unfair game balance. Im pretty decent at the game but thats because I chose to learn it on more than a surface level. As survivor its important to learn killer powers and movements to predict their next move and counter on the spot, as killer you need to understand your power and look for survivor queues for the perks they are running. Is the survivor looking back constantly? bait out the dead hard, did you just unhook a survivor and they jumped straight into a locker or ran right back upto you? Decisive Strike it is. This games best gameplay is moment to moment and its a shame that the community lets it down so often. There seems to be a massive split of talent in this game, either people are really good or really bad, there sint really a middle ground and most of the time youll find a lot of the talented people are chill, they will gg you after a game if you run them well as survivor, or alternatively they will tell you the good job you did blocking loops if you outplayed them as a killer. The biggest problem in this game (not exclusive, talented people like to stroke their egos also but its a lot less frequent in my experience) is those that struggle with the games mechanics and who will die consistently through their own actions, yet will report you, abuse you in the end game chat and its just baffling that instead of learning the game on a fundamental level, they resort to racial slurs and abuse.

You'll find great people playing this game, that I can pretty much assure you, but you will without question run into people who will not be pleasant to interact with in the slightest. If you do decide to pick this up, go in with a carefree attitude and try to have fun learning the basics. Find a few people as survivor or test out multiple killers and watch yourself improve quickly. It really is quite the rewarding experience :)
好心去给农场主修机器，不给钱还打人。

The only reason I continue to play this game is to justify the amount of money I've put into it.  The community is toxic (streamers are the worst) and the game has several exploits and ways to play around letting others play the game.  If you're into suffering and misery, by all means, play this game, but the fact that I have to play the meta to "win" is it really winning?  The devs know this is a problem and maybe I'll recommend this game after many many many patches and updates but as for now I do not feel like this is a good game.
respectfully worse than Wriday the Whirteenth.
